song.eTitle: I Vow to Thee, My Country

verses.verse: I vow to thee, my country, all earthly things above, Entire the whole and perfect, the service of my love: The love that asks the reason, The love that stands the test, That lays upon the altar the dearest and the best; The love that never falters, the love that pays the price, The love that makes undaunted the final sacrifice.
